text: Ɲɛɛ solofere dangu xanbini, Yehoyada sɛnbɛn yi gbo ayi, a yi layirin xidi e nun gali kuntigini itoe tagi naxanye yi dɔxi sofa kɛmɛ xun na: Yeroxamaa dii xɛmɛna Asari nun Yehoxanan ma dii xɛmɛn Yisimayɛli nun Obedi a dii xɛmɛna Asari nun Adayaa dii xɛmɛn Maaseya, e nun Sikiri a dii xɛmɛna Elisafati.
